menuItems.name: Cherry Pie Bites
menuItems.description: Mini cherry pies served warm with a flaky crust - the most iconic Twin Peaks treat
dietaryOptions: Can be made gluten-free with alternative crust

menuItems.name: Damn Fine Coffee Station
menuItems.description: Premium dark roast coffee bar with cream, sugar, and flavored syrups

menuItems.name: Donut Holes Bar
menuItems.description: Assorted donut holes with coffee glaze, powdered sugar, and chocolate drizzle

menuItems.name: Classic Diner Sandwiches
menuItems.description: Assorted finger sandwiches: turkey club, BLT, grilled cheese, veggie

menuItems.name: Great Northern Lodge Salad
menuItems.description: Mixed greens with candied pecans, dried cherries, goat cheese, and cherry vinaigrette

menuItems.name: Pacific Northwest Cheese Board
menuItems.description: Local cheeses, crackers, fresh fruit, honey, and nuts

menuItems.name: Forest Fruit Display
menuItems.description: Seasonal fresh fruit with emphasis on berries and cherries

menuItems.name: Spiked Hot Chocolate Bar
menuItems.description: Rich hot chocolate with optional liqueur additions and whipped cream

tasks: Shop for all ingredients and supplies
Prep sandwich ingredients (wash lettuce, slice tomatoes, etc.)
Assemble sandwiches and cut into quarters
Remove cheese board from fridge to come to room temperature
Final check on coffee station supplies
Arrange all food on serving tables
Light Sterno or warming trays for hot items
